prompt:
Translate the following subtitles into Korean. 

Please PRESERVE ALL the original timestamps for EACH ENTRY.

Subtitles to process:
[
  {
    "start": "00:00:00,000",
    "end": "00:00:02,840",
    "lang": "en",
    "text": "This bird just get this carrot."
  },
  {
    "start": "00:00:04,760",
    "end": "00:00:07,860",
    "lang": "en",
    "text": "She is so beautiful with yellow eyes."
  }
]

ONLY and ALWAYS return a valid JSON back:
```json
[
  {
    "start": "timestamp",
    "end": "timestamp",
    "ko": "Korean text"
  }
]
```

response.ko: 이 새가 방금 이 당근을 가져갔어요.
노란 눈을 가진 그녀는 정말 아름다워요.
